fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Vote to hang someone each night. They're hanged.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your hanging is separate from any other hanging.
- Your vote cannot be interacted with by effects that interact with normal abilities, as it's a vote. Effects that interact with votes will affect your vote.
- For all intents and purposes, The Town is a Town role.
